hehe, bigbrother is watching u, the client or the server?, to use the client u have to start the daemon, then make sure u have marc switched on in system preferences .. go to acquisitions, search on title, choose add new, then u should be at a page that has a z3950 search button on it, if u type an isbn number into the isbn number box on that page, and hit z3950 search, off it will go, oh, in admin/parameters .. you will need to have set up a list of z39.50 servers to use, z3950-daemon-launch.sh is the script to start the daemon, it lives in /usr/local/koha/intranet/scripts/z3950daemon, if /usr/local/koha is where u installed koha
